XScalerAperture Struct Reference

#include <xscaler.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XScalerAperture data structure for Aperture and scale factor control. The scale factor values are calculated using the field in this structure


Public Attributes

u32 InLastLine
u32 InFirstPixel
u32 InLastPixel

Member Data Documentation

The first pixel index in the input video

The last line index in the input video

Horizontal size of the output video
